name: 1-low-general
content:
# Simple Node Hardware MCP Test

Please show my CPU information.

name: 2-medium-system
content:
# System Health Check

Please perform a comprehensive system health check including CPU, memory, and disk information.

name: 3-low-memory
content:
# Memory Status Check

Show me the current memory usage and availability on this system.

name: 4-medium-network
content:
# Network Information

Please provide detailed information about the network configuration and status of this system.

name: 5-high-comprehensive
content:
# Comprehensive System Analysis

Perform a complete system analysis including:
1. CPU information and performance
2. Memory usage and availability
3. Disk space and storage details
4. Network configuration and status
5. General system information

Provide a summary report of the overall system health.
